creator: keytonw@mindspring.com
text:
I'm working with the Tomcat Beta 7. I have created the following JSP 
(as a JSP document):
<jsp:root xmlns:jsp="http://java.sun.com/JSP/Page" version="1.2"
xmlns:ora="/oratags">
<jsp:text><![CDATA[

<HTML>
<HEAD>
<TITLE>Test JSP</TITLE>
</HEAD>
<BODY>
]]>
</jsp:text>
<ora:defineObjects></ora:defineObjects>
<jsp:text><![CDATA[

</BODY>
</HTML>

]]>
</jsp:text>
</jsp:root>

When I attempt to validate it, the XML view looks like this:

<jsp:root
  xmlns:jsp="http://java.sun.com/JSP/Page"
  version="1.2"
  xmlns:jsp="http://java.sun.com/JSP/Page"
  version="1.2"
  xmlns:ora="/oratags"
>
<jsp:text><![CDATA[

<HTML>
<HEAD>
<TITLE>Test JSP</TITLE>
</HEAD>
<BODY>

]]>
</jsp:text>
<ora:defineObjects></ora:defineObjects>
<jsp:text><![CDATA[

</BODY>
</HTML>

]]>
</jsp:text>
</jsp:root>
</jsp:root>

I thought this was taken care of somewhere around Beta 6. It's not a 
big deal to what I'm doing. I just thought I'd let someone know....

Will be fixed by the patch for Bugzilla #3351, in nightly build 20010907.


*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 3351 ***
creator: craig.mcclanahan@sun.com
